1.title: Si pedrong walang takot

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Adelino is the most handsome tailor in the land, but it seems as if his reputation is not enough for him. This is the latest story told by Herbie to the kids at the beach. Follow Adelino's journey as he deceives and manipulates his way into becoming a prince.

2.title: Guwapong sastre

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: Adelino is the most handsome tailor in the land, but it seems as if his reputation is not enough for him. This is the latest story told by Herbie to the kids at the beach. Follow Adelino's journey as he deceives and manipulates his way into becoming a prince. But what happens when the truth catches up to him?

3.title: Ang palasyo ng mga duwende

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: This is a story of a young woman, whose heart is as beautiful as her appearance. When her mother died, her father re-married. Her step-mother and step-sister were both envious of her beauty that they did everything to make her life unbearable, especially when her father died. Will she be able to find happiness?

4.title: Ang kapatid ng tatlong Marya

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: This is a tale of a man who dreamed of a better life. Soon, the man became greedy and for this he was punished. His three daughters were taken from him as the consequence of his evil actions. He soon had another child, this time a boy. Before his death he requested that his son should find his sisters who were now wives of beastly animals. Will he accomplish this task? And will his sisters remember their real father?

5.title: Ang hukbo ni padre Pedro

6.title: Ang plautin ni periking

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: To reward her son and his group mates for their cooperation and hard work, Herbie tells them the story of "Ang Plautin ni Periking." In the story, Periking feels out of place with his brothers because of a huge age gap, but when the older brothers are the ones who need his help, it is up to Periking to save the day. But how can Periking save his brothers?

7.title: Anting-anting

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: In "Anting-anting", Herbie tells the story of the very handsome and very conceited, but very cowardly, Huwan. What will happen to Huwan when everyone discovers his secret fear? And what lessons does Herbie want to impart to her son and her nephew with this story?

10.title: Pandakyotyong

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

10.plot: Herbie's story about Pandakotyong tells the children that appearances are not a reliable source of knowing a person. Pandakotyong is a midget who wishes to prove he can be something more than a stay-at-home freak. When Pandakotyong aspires to give his mother a better life and when he falls in love with a princess, he becomes the source of courage and hope of everyone.

11.title: Ang kastilyong bakal

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

11.plot: "Ang Kastilyong Bakal" is a story of a love that is endless and cannot be hindered by anyone. This is the story of the Princess Olivia and Prince Agaton, young lovers who are separated by the jealous sorcerer Serpenton. With only his ingenuity and a few choice items from the elders of his kingdom, Prince Agaton goes on a journey to save the love of his life.

12.title: Prinsesang kalbo

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

12.plot: Prinsesa Natalia is blessed with a kind heart, but the only negative thing about her is that she grew up with no hair on her head. The poor princess was banished because of this, but later on she will meet a young gentleman who will give her the love she deserves.

13.title: Pitong hilo

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

13.plot: For Herbie's final tale, she shares the story about the seven men who are susceptible to being conned. Simple-minded to a fault, the seven are taken in by a kind couple only to learn that their lives are about to be more difficult with the presence of these men. Will the couple turn them away? Or will the seven prove that even when hope is nowhere to be found, it can still be found?

1.title: Ang mahiwagang Kuba

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Prince Jorge is an enchanted prince,, who was cursed to become a hideous hunchback until a beautiful lady with a golden heart gives her love to him. In his quest for this beautiful lady, he meets Princess Lucinda, who promises to marry anyone who can heal the ailing king. He also meets a kind-hearted beggar named Feli, who helps him without expecting anything in return. Can the prince heal the ailing king? Is Princess Lucinda the answer to the prince's prayer? Who will truly break the curse?

4.title: Ang binibining tumalo sa hari

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: The beautiful and intelligent Sharay (Rhian Ramos) is every man's dream girl. In their kingdom, men compete to win her heart, including the Datu Abdul (Eddie Garcia)'s son, Prinsipe Arando (Paolo Contis). But Sharay is a daughter of a slave, and the law of their land prohibits the marriage of two people who belong from different classes. Datu Abdul tries to suppress Arando's love for Sharay, but he does not succeed. The ruler thus plots many hard challenges for Sharay. Will she past the tests and prove herself worthy of Arando?

5.title: Ang mahiwagang biyulin

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: A young man named Rodrigo (Ogie Alcasid) has been working for his master Ahab (Leo Martinez) for a long time, and he has never received any compensation for it. No matter how many times he asks for his salary, his master never pays him any attention. The young man helps an old woman, who rewards him with a magical violin. Will his life change after playing the instrument?

6.title: Ang prinsipeng mahaba ang ilong

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: Princess Elyana was the most beautiful princess in the land, and King Anselmo was her most devoted suitor. Due to a curse, the princess wasn't allowed to fall in love with anyone. Haring Anselmo tried to help the young princess. The result was that another curse was bestowed upon the princess and the King as well. What will happen?

7.title: Ang sumpa ng higanteng si amok

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: This story is about a kingdom, whose people do not value the idea of cleanliness. Due to their unsanitary way of living, a giant named Amok will punish them. What will be the curse bestowed by this giant? What will happen to the people of this kingdom?

12.title: Ang prinsipe ng mga Ibon

episode of.title: Mga kuwento ni Lola Basyang (TV Series 2007– )

12.plot: Prinsesa Singsing has a hidden lover named Prinsipeng Ibon. Later on, the Princess tells her father about her affair. Haring Tongkiang is furious as he does not want his daughter to marry a bird. What will he do to stop their affair? Will he succeed? Or will true love prevail?

imdb.plot outline: Mga Kuwento Ni Lola Basyang gives a fresh take to the traditional rocking chair storytelling by introducing a younger character who will continue the legacy of Lola Basyang. Singer-actress Manilyn Reynes stars as Gervacia Zamora Reyes a.k.a. Hervie, Lola Basyang's compassionately strong-willed and high-spirited granddaughter who has made it her personal advocacy to disseminate Lola Basyang's unforgettable stories. Together with her eight-year-old son Efren, she drives around in a "rolling library" van packed with Lola Basyang's books and goes to various places to spread Lola Basyang's classic tales and golden values.
